ingredients: 2 lg. portobello mushroom caps, dark gills scraped out with a spoon, cut into 1/2-inch-thick slices
8-12 oz. assorted mushrooms, such as oyster, maitake, and bunashimeji, trimmed
Kosher salt & freshly ground black pepper
Kosher salt & freshly ground black pepper
4-5 cups reduced-sodium chicken broth, or as needed
2/3 cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese, plus more [shaved] for serving
